shawn.name: Shawn Reece
shawn.bio: Shawn Reece is a veteran of the United States Military and manages the more practical side of P.H.A.T. Tags. He is the supportive father of Andersen Sturner and assists him in the more complex aspects of business. His passions include supporting his family, cybersecurity and making money. He enjoys investing, spending time with his family, old movies and his work.
